input.file: path to a single CSV file containing all ranked lists (in separate columns)
input.separator: separator character between columns in the CSV file, default ;
input.col_id: column name holding identifiers, e.g., id
col_scores: array of column names that hold the input scores, e.g., score1, score2, score3

settings.k: integer specifying the number of items to be retrieved having the top aggregated scores
settings.algorithm: the algorithm to be applied:, e.g., Bordacount, threshold,
weights: array of real values in [0..1] specifying the weight (if applicable) per input ranked list, e.g., [0.3,0.5,...]
